price: 我拯救他和鲁特，而使他俩迁移到我为世人而降福的地方去。
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
